'''Kingdom O' Magic''' is a video game and parody of [[Middle-earth]].<ref name="Tolkien Games">[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/kom.html Kingdom O' Magic] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 1 April 2011)</ref><ref name="El Anillo">[http://www.meristation.com/v3/des_articulo.php?pic=GEN&id=2254&idj=&idp=&tipo=art&c=1&pos=8 Meristation, El Anillo interactivo] p. 9 (retrieved 1 April 2011)</ref><ref>[http://www.giantbomb.com/kingdom-o-magic/61-19407/ Kingdom O' Magic] at GiantBoomb (retrieved 1 April 2011)</ref><ref name="Baidu">[http://tieba.baidu.com/f?kz=177120564 Baidu, 托尔金相关游戏简介] (retrieved 1 April 2011)</ref> The game includes [[Ringwraiths]] and [[Rings of Power|magic rings]]. It was written by [[Fergus McNeill]].<ref name="Tolkien Games"/><ref name="El Anillo"/><ref name="Baidu"/>
